document.title: Thailand Ministry of Education Indicators and Standards

A5C395E07EB2425DB5DDED3C77480159.description:
Disseminate/convey to
the public data and news
about the school,
community and the local
area/the nation in foreign
languages.

B1E7E46D54CA4EDA86D4B2B1080D3A15.description:
.Use foreign languages in
conducting research,
collecting, analysing and
summarising
knowledge/various data
from the media and
different learning sources
for further education and
livelihood.

4AEA0AEB868541A59C0E8ED606440748.description:
Usage of foreign languages as basic tools for further education,
livelihood and exchange of learning with the world community

7CA4790D6AC24A4AA792A056EF95B1EA.description:
Use language for
communication in real
situations/simulated
situations in the
classroom, school,
community and society.

F89586FA44684A798C9239CF67ACF632.description:
Ability to use foreign languages in various situations in school,
community and society

22FE1D6411174065AA9E83C87F4988EA.description:
Research/search for, make
records, summarise and
express opinions about the
data related to other
learning areas, and present
them through speaking and
writing.

29EEC2D4DB2448CC94D6378DB9219B41.description:
Usage of foreign languages to link knowledge with other learning
areas, as foundation for further development and to seek knowledge
and widen one's world view

BB9BF0D53B844C58AD42FD6765804582.description:
Analyse/discuss
similarities and
differences between the
lifestyles, beliefs and
culture of native speakers
and those of Thais, and
apply them appropriately.

C62F33EDAD524C608085216776379FC8.description:
Explain/compare
differences between the
structures of sentences,
texts, idioms, sayings,
proverbs and poems in
foreign languages and
Thai language.

3C1AE5BA774145ECA65082BB5665DBE7.description:
Appreciation of similarities and differences between language and
culture of native and Thai speakers, and capacity for accurate and
appropriate use of language

03F8E155F71640A8B862299EFBF8925E.description:
Participate in, give advice
and organise language and
cultural activities
appropriately.

A489AF6B924B477C8B7C7259A86FB85D.description:
Explain/discuss the
lifestyles, thoughts, beliefs
and origins of customs and
traditions of native
speakers.

5E47E0B1C8CE41A2849CF583B3D19D01.description:
Choose the language, tone
of voice, gestures and
manners appropriate to
various persons, occasions
and places by observing
social manners and culture
of native speakers.

F312A13B6A1042AA80FAC040843E351F.description:
Appreciation of the relationship between language and culture of native
speakers and capacity for use of language appropriate to occasions and
places

D68DF8AEA302426A8EF96ACEFE9BFCC4.description: Speak and write to express opinions about activities, experiences and incidents in the local area, society and the world, as well as provide justifications and examples for illustration.

5302867648074AE7BC084EBDD868C83A.description: Speak and write to summarise the main idea/theme identified from analysis of matters, activities, news, incidents and situations in accordance with their interests.

F8BA53BD1265492FB3D9433D73A8D2A9.description:
Speak and write to
present data
themselves/experiences,
news/incidents, matters
and various issues of
interest to society.

DCF31780110A493488B29B06610D2D41.description:
Ability to present data, information, concepts and views about various
matters through speaking and writing

E8A89ED100FF41CBA634E7D1AABFDC3F.description:
Speak and write to describe
their own feelings and
opinions about various
matters, activities,
experiences and news/
incidents with proper
reasoning.

D2B2294B75AB48DE8C768034216BEC8F.description:
Speak and write
appropriately to ask for
and give data, describe,
explain, compare and
express opinions about
matters/ issues/news and
situations heard and read.

F99CC572AE6A4BE89A8B342A2B399FAA.description:
Speak and write to
express needs and offer,
accept and refuse to give
help in simulated or real
situations.

51BB6286BF694042849038616CD09F96.description:
Choose and use requests
and give instructions,
clarifications and
explanations fluently.

06A72E74DA8A475EABEC8FE5CC4F91CE.description:
Converse and write to
exchange data about
themselves and various
matters around them,
experiences, situations,
news/incidents and issues
of interest to society, and
communicate the data
continuously and
appropriately.

B821FAF57C8E49F284A98DA23A31630E.description:
Endowment with language communication skills for exchange of data
and information; efficient expression of feelings and opinions

834E6B3B19E04F8B9B6A6730A7BD2BCC.description:
Identify the main idea, analyse
the essence, interpret and
express opinions from
listening to and reading
feature articles and
entertainment articles, as well
as provide justifications and
examples for illustration.

66CA4A4AE6BE4C85B70740D2B32C5951.description:
Explain and write
sentences and texts related
to various forms of nontext
information, as well
as specify and write
various forms of non-text
information related to
sentences and texts heard
or read.

5AE965F1EAA04ADB9AF03E64DE097A2E.description:
Accurately read aloud
texts, news,
advertisements, poems and
skits by observing the
principles of reading.

C4B6A1D0317E4959892B0A02AE6CD753.description:
Observe instructions in
manuals for various types
of work, clarifications,
explanations and
descriptions heard and
read.

96ADC834C35A484D9C950ED02FC56EE7.description:
Understanding of and capacity to interpret what has been heard and
read from various types of media, and ability to express opinions with
proper reasoning
